title: DTL service disruption due to signalling fault

updates.text: DTL full service has resumed at 6.57am. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.

DTL service from DT1 Bukit Panjang to DT6 King Albert Park (towards DT35 Expo) is delayed due to a signalling fault. Additional travel time of about 5 minutes may be expected. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
